text:
Eric Adrian Bauza (born December 7, 1979) is a Canadian-born American voice actor, stand-up comedian and animation artist. His roles include Stimpy on "Ren and Stimpy "Adult Party Cartoon"", Rudolfo Rivera/White Pantera on ', Foop on "The Fairly OddParents" and Lord Stingray on "Superjail!".
He is also one of the current voices of characters such as Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Marvin the Martian, Pepé Le Pew, Tweety, Woody Woodpecker, Boo-Boo Bear, Ranger Smith, Scrappy Doo, and Dino.
